channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 10:47 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 10:47 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 游리 10:26 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region

item.title: 游리 10:17 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Myrivska territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 10:17 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Myrivska territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 游 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
item.description: 游 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291#햌혞혪햫혜햨햦햧_햟햧쮏 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
